data.meta_description: Paul Kurtz, chief cybersecurity advisor & field CTO for Splunk, emphasizes the importance of a partnership approach in integrating AI into organizations‚Ä¶
data.text:
Back and better than ever before: Arkose Accelerate! Hear from cybersecurity execs leading the strategic efforts at the biggest companies in the world. Register today!

Back and better than ever before: Arkose Accelerate! Hear from cybersecurity execs leading the strategic efforts at the biggest companies in the world. Register today!

Back and better than ever before: Arkose Accelerate! Hear from cybersecurity execs leading the strategic efforts at the biggest companies in the world. Register today!

We had an insightful session this morning on AI's Transformative Impact on Cybersecurity Strategies. Huge thanks to Melissa Musser CPA CITP CISA CIA Musser and Darren Hulem from GRF CPAs & Advisors for their great presentation!

What do global #security leaders really think about AI? How is the cybersecurity landscape evolving? We've got the answers. Join us on Wednesday, 18 October for a discussion featuring Splunk's own Kirsty Paine and Ryan Kovar as we explore Splunk's 2023 #CISO Report. Sign up here! #SplunkSecurity

Do you want to learn about all things cybersecurity? Then there's no one better to hear from than Palo Alto Networks Founder & CTO Nir Zuk! Tune into #ThreatVector to hear Nir's thoughts on all things cybersecurity, including human capabilities vs. AI. Listen to the episode here: üéß ‚è© https://bit.ly/3WKelV5

This journey through the past 2 decades of cybersecurity is a wild one! We've come a long way from prevention and detection to a new era of breach containment. Check out this infographic from Illumio to see how the strategies have changed.
